quote: In society, those who don't have many abilities tend to complain more.
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
Push through the pain, giving up hurts more.
I am justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil.
The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us trying the best it can.
It's not the world that's messed up, it's those of us in it.
Never forget who you want to become.
You have no way of knowing how much a person really loves you.
Fear is not evil. It tells you your own weaknesses.
Assassination is just a business. Killing is simple.
To defeat evil, I shall become a greater evil.
Life isn’t just doing things for yourself. It's possible to live in such a way that other people's happiness makes you happy too.
I hate myself more than anyone, so I won’t hurt others.
Even if you forget me, I will remember you.
I wonder. Do you pilot the Eva for yourself?
Survival of the fittest is the law of nature.
A true warrior needs no sword.
Talent is something you make bloom. Instinct is something you polish.
When people realize how lonely it is being on their own, they will become kind.
A person is only limited by the thoughts that he chooses.
The law doesn't protect people. People protect the law.
Surpass your limits. Right here, right now.
Would you be my friend, even if I told you I was a liar?
No one knows what the future holds. That’s why its potential is infinite.
Even if we forget the faces of our friends, we will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.
The reason doesn’t matter. As long as you do what’s right, you’re a hero.

anime: The Rising of the Shield Hero
quote: I will be your sword and fight for you.
